page.title: 01Gazetteer
page.content: There are about{42,000 people}in Tonbridge.The history of the town goes back to{1066}when{William}fought in battle for the crown.He built a{castle on a hill which is in our park.There are several well known schools and two of them are{Tonbridge Public School and{Judd School.}People from different towns come here for a good education. There is a{large shopping centre. There are many different pubs and restaurants.We have{no cinemas}but we have a theatre called the{Oast Theatre which is a converted oast house.We have a{library}where we can get books,records and cassettes.There are factories which make things like plastics,and factories which carry out light engineering,printing and brick making.There are people who work in London but live in Tonbridge.
